item.title: CVE-2024-6917|2024-08-12T14:51:48.043Z -- veribilim%20software -- veribase%20order%20management
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection') vulnerability in Veribilim Software Veribase Order Management allows OS Command Injection.This issue affects Veribase Order Management: before v4.010.2.
